name: Crazy Cacti
description:
Hi,

This Game is all about dodging Cacti,  collecting Powerups, Coins and avoiding Obstacles.

To Complete a Level You got to have at least One Star. You get Stars at a certain amount of coins collected.

Don't wonder. Sometimes you can't get all Coins.

Controls:

Dodging - A , D

Slow Motion - Space

Pause Menu - Esc (If in Full Screen Mode Press Twice)

Ingame Powerups / Powerdowns:

- Egg - A and D is Reversed for a certain time.

- Gem - Slow Motion for a certain time.

- Pill - Speed Up for a certain time.

- Candy - Walls Are Wider for a certain time.

-Red Pressure Plate - Makes a Cactus appear

-Green Pressure Plate - Makes a Cactus disappear

It's a very short Game with 5 Levels. If you'd like to see Updates of this game please let me know. Thanks.
